tha-ap270:0.3_0: As a jackal was so pretty,
tha-ap270:1.1_0: “Most people are on the bank of the rivers,
tha-ap270:1.2_0: what I was afflicted with food,
tha-ap270:1.4_0: you’ve been born in a ball of string.
tha-ap270:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap270:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap270:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Paṇḍuḷiya.
tha-ap270:6.1_0: The eighth flower was completed by a senior of flowers.
